name: Rocket Ship (lynnlo)
description:
Rocket Ship Unique Movement

Taking inspirations from actual spaceship, the movement in this game relies on a constant velocity system. This means disengaging the engine won't stop the ship; to do that, you'll have to point the ship the other and then thrust forward.

Rotation is control via the WASD keys while thrusters are only controlled by the arrow key. Controlling the ship isn't easy, but eventually you'll get used to it. (It's not like it's rocket science...)

Resource Management

Your rocket ship will have resources like fuel, oxygen, and energy. You'll have to juggle between these resources and plan missions accordingly.

If you run out of any of the resources, you'll die.

Original Music

This game includes original, atmospheric music.

Campaign (Planned)

Upgrades can bought with money gained from missions. These upgrades will open up new opportunities and make everything easier.

If you die, you lose everything. So try not to do that.

OPEN BETA : Everything is subject to change.
